spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent overall room layout and adjacency. Wall alignment remains true to the dimensions provided in the floor plan. Minor deduction for the simplification of window frame thicknesses and slight over-scaling of the kitchen island relative to the plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: Full compliance. No text or UI elements are present. The roof is removed, revealing all interior partitions. The model is correctly floating on a dark neutral background without floor grounding.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture follows the block-style requirement and matches the plan's placement precisely, including beds, dining area, and kitchen fixtures. Minor deduction for slight rotation of the living room coffee table compared to the plan's orientation.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Perfect isometric orthographic camera angle. Materials are correctly low-poly and flat-shaded without realistic textures. Lighting is soft and ambient as requested.

detected_errors.description: Kitchen island and sink scale is slightly exaggerated compared to the 2D blueprint proportions.
